RumorFact.Text: Sunfish says they and Salmon are packing up the Outer Wilds Rescue base and moving to Ravenous Tides.

ExploreFact.Text: Outer Wilds Rescue is moving into one of the residences in this settlement, because there are no good locations known to build a dedicated base.
This settlement is becoming very overcrowded, but there's nowhere else on this planet discovered where a new settlement could be built.

RumorFact.Text: Bass says there is a Precursor ruin on the seafloor.

ExploreFact.Text: The Precursors built something called the "third node", which involved a pocket dimension.
The Precursors wanted to take revenge by destroying "them".

RumorFact.Text: Bass says there is a Precursor ruin on the seafloor that's leaking strange energy.

ExploreFact.Text: The Precursors finished construction of the weapon at great expense.
Shortly after the completion of the weapon, there was radio silence from the Home System.
